revised_title: Atmospheric Electricity in High Latitudes: Observations and Findings
tldr: This article discusses the author's year-long research on atmospheric electricity in Lapland, focusing on measurements of the potential gradient, dissipation, and ionization. The author also provides a brief overview of the meteorological conditions experienced during the study. The research aimed to extend knowledge of electrical conditions in high latitudes and contribute to understanding the Earth's atmospheric processes.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Atmospheric Science
